backendTools.description: Node.js is an open-source, cross-platform, back-end JavaScript runtime environment that runs on the V8 engine and executes JavaScript code outside a web browser
Prisma is an open-source ORM for Node. js and TypeScript. It is used as an alternative to writing plain SQL, or using another database access tool such as SQL query builders
GraphQL is an open-source data query and manipulation language for APIs, and a runtime for fulfilling queries with existing data
